io.getstream.client.okhttp.repo

Class StreamRepositoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.getstream.client.okhttp.repo.StreamRepositoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamRepository

    public class StreamRepositoryImpl
extends Object
implements StreamRepository
    Actual implementation of the Stream's REST API calls.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StreamRepositoryImpl(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, ClientConfiguration streamClient, com.squareup.okhttp.OkHttpClient closeableHttpClient)
      Create a new StreamRepository using the given configuration ClientConfiguration and a pre-instantiated HttpClient OkHttpClient.

        Description copied from interface: StreamRepository
        Lists the activities in the given feed.
        Specified by:
        getActivities in interface StreamRepository
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter out the activities. Limited to 25 items by default.

        List of activities

      • addActivityToMany

        public <T extends BaseActivity> T addActivityToMany(List<String> targetIds,
                                                    T activity)
                                             throws StreamClientException,
                                                    IOException
        Description copied from interface: StreamRepository
        Add a new activity of type T to multiple feeds.
        Specified by:
        addActivityToMany in interface StreamRepository
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        targetIds - Destination feeds. A target id is defined as $feedSlug:$feedId.
        activity - Activity to add.
        Returns:
        Response activity of type T coming from the server.
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • getNotificationActivities

        public <T extends BaseActivity> StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getNotificationActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                                                  Class<T> type,
                                                                                                  FeedFilter filter,
                                                                                                  boolean markAsRead,
                                                                                                  boolean markAsSeen)
                                                                                           throws IOException,
                                                                                                  StreamClientException
        Description copied from interface: StreamRepository
        List notifications marking the activities as read and/or as seen.
        Specified by:
        getNotificationActivities in interface StreamRepository
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter the activities.
        markAsRead - Mark all the activities as read.
        markAsSeen - Mark all the activities as seen.
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getNotificationActivities

        public <T extends BaseActivity> StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getNotificationActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                                                  Class<T> type,
                                                                                                  FeedFilter filter,
                                                                                                  MarkedActivity markAsRead,
                                                                                                  MarkedActivity markAsSeen)
                                                                                           throws IOException,
                                                                                                  StreamClientException
        Description copied from interface: StreamRepository
        List notifications marking some of them as read and/or as seen. An immutable list of activities to be marked as read and/or as seen can be built using the MarkedActivity builder.
        Specified by:
        getNotificationActivities in interface StreamRepository
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter the activities.
        markAsRead - List of activities to be marked as read.
        markAsSeen - List of activities to be marked as seen.
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

        @Deprecated
public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getObjectMapper()
        Deprecated.
